name: Seedling
description: What a lovely little seedling.Go on now,  plant it in the field!

name: Beast Hoof
description: This is a base component of Leaf Fertilizer.When making fertilizer,  you'll start with this before deciding what other nutrients to add.

name: Beast Manure
description: This is a base component of Kernel Fertilizer.When making fertilizer,  you'll start with this before deciding what other nutrients to add.

name: Fallen Leaves
description: This is a base component of Root Fertilizer.When making fertilizer,  you'll start with this before deciding what other nutrients to add.

name: Oil Cake
description: This is a base component for any fertilizer.When making fertilizer,  you'll start with this before deciding what other nutrients to add.

name: Powder of Transformation
description: Ah,  how rare! This powder alters the flow of time,  allowing fertilizer to be completed immediately.

name: Orb of Transformation
description: A divine fruit grown from the Tree of Creation.Its very essence is ripe with spiritual energy.How shall we put its power to use,  Princess?

name: Revitalizing Remedy
description: A chemical that revitalizes life,  returning plants from their weakened state. If you mix it in withfertilizer,  it will cure some rice disorders.

name: Reducing Remedy
description: A chemical that reduces excess,  restoring plantsto their proper balance. If you mix it in withfertilizer,  it will cure some rice disorders.

name: Eradicating Remedy
description: A chemical that wards off pests,  saving plants from invasive insects. If you mix it in withfertilizer,  it will cure some rice disorders.

name: Health's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Health Pollution.

name: Skill's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Skill Pollution.

name: Fullness' Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Fullness Pollution.

name: Strength's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Strength Pollution.

name: Vitality's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Vitality Pollution.

name: Magic's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Magic Pollution.

name: Luck's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Luck Pollution.

name: Gusto's Bounty
description: Power that was lost when demons ruined our fields.Spread it as fertilizer and your powers shall be restored ,  purifying the land of Gusto Pollution.

name: Rotten Food
description: Hoho! It seems this uneaten food has spoiled.However,  we can still use this as fertilizer.

name: Clay
description: This earth is soft,  viscous,  and easy to process.

name: Stone
description: A stone chunk that could be used for almost anything.Unfortunately,  its quality leaves much to be desired.

name: Copper Ore
description: This ore has long been used as a material to craftcertain metals.

name: Iron Ore
description: A strong,  pliable metal. In shaping it,  apprenticesmiths shape themselves into masters of the craft.

name: Jade
description: Jade is known to have miraculous powers. Not onlyis it used as currency,  but it is revered by manyas a ceremonial implement as well.

name: Obsidian
description: Iridescent obsidian such as this is said to beexceptionally rare. No doubt it would make for finecrafting material.

name: Gold Ore
description: The glister of gold is the spark which ignitesthe flames of war. Do be careful not to becometoo enthralled by it,  Princess.

name: Stainless Steel
description: This is steel from Dharka,  a country that lies farto the west,  and it's supposedly impervious to rust.I must say,  its striped pattern is quite beautiful.

name: Cloudy Crystal
description: A jewel formed from the dense Clouds of Beginning,  which separate the two realms. Just one of thesecontains enough power to create a small island.

name: Wood
description: This wood can be used in various ways.Unfortunately,  its quality leaves much to be desired.

name: High Quality Oak
description: This is hard,  sturdy wood. I wager it could be crafted into a fine tool.

name: Bamboo
description: A plant that is neither tree nor grass. Indeed,  it is difficult to classify... Nevertheless,  bamboo is quite flexible and easy to process.

name: Ironwood
description: This wood is not only hard,  but resistant to water,  meaning that it is slow to rot. Thus,  its appellation is well deserved.

name: Elder Elm
description: The origin of all Yanato elm trees,  nearly as old as the Lofty Realm itself. The quality of its woodis unsurpassed,  but it's as rare as it is ancient.

name: Hemp
description: This grass fiber is indispensable for weaving.

name: Sedge
description: This plant is often used to craft straw hats and raincoats. I have heard that it is easierto raise in humid climes.

name: Hemp Palm
description: Bark imported from a southern country.It rivals straw in its ease of use.

name: Leaf of Creation
description: Aha,  so you found an untainted leaf from Hinoe'sTree of Creation? If you can gather enough to useas materials,  I imagine you'll gain untold power.

name: Cork Tree Branch
description: This golden tree branch can be used to createa stunning yellow dye. Strip the bark and seeits brilliant hue for yourself!

name: Murasaki Root
description: This plant root can be used to create purple dye.It thrives in soil that gets regular runoff exposure.

name: Madder
description: A root which is used to make red dyes. It can befound in the mountainous regions of this island.

name: Indigo Scale
description: A fish scale that can be turned into a bluish-purpledye,  if it's crushed and mixed with the right plants.

name: Silk
description: This is a fiber produced by the thread of silkworms,  which were brought over from the country of Ouka.

name: Spirit Thread
description: A miraculous thread selected from the finest silk.It is both a delight to the eyes and strong enoughto repel blades. It should make an excellent outfit.

name: Washi Paper
description: Yanato's highest quality paper,  said to lastfor a thousand years. In fact,  it's strongenough you can even make clothes out if it.

name: Demonic Braid
description: How ominous... This cord appears to have been wovenwith the accursed power of a multitude of demons.May we find a way to bring some good out of it.

name: Thunderous Tasuki
description: A cord that is used to tie up kimono sleeves.This one contains the power of lightning,  the ultimate expression of wood energy.

name: Beast Hide
description: The skinned hide of a most ferocious demon.It can be tanned into durable leather.

name: Deer Antler
description: Taken from the skull of a deer demon. It can be usedin its current state,  or processed into an evenhigher-quality material.

name: Demonic Pearl
description: A jewel formed inside the shell of a demon clam.Apparently its devolution into demonhood has onlyserved to increase the quality of its pearl.

name: Ashigumo Shuriken
description: This is a throwing needle of the Ashigumo tribe,  who you mercifully defeated. Even now,  it holdsa lingering manifestation of their loyal spirits.

name: Black Deer Leather
description: The resilient hide of a black deer demon.When I close my eyes,  I can still vividlysee your fierce battle with the beast!

name: Pheasant Feather
description: A silver feather plucked from a demon pheasant.Faint light emanates from it.

name: Boar Tusk
description: A tremendous tusk,  taken from a boar that hadtransformed into a mighty demon.

name: Badger Leaf
description: Ah,  was this attached to a demon badger's forehead?It's teeming with magical power. They must be moreselective in choosing their leaves than I thought.

name: Bear Hide
description: Oho,  the hide of a demon bear. Even in this form,  it exudes power and seems difficult to work with.It will certainly make for a high-quality material.

name: Crane Feather
description: A feather belonging to Yui,  an exceptionally rarespirit crane. If turned into thread,  it could be woveninto an unparalleled garment.

name: Dragon Bone
description: A vertebra once belonging to Omizuchi,  gifted to usby Lady Kamuhitsuki. If we combine it with the Edgeof Hoshidama,  it shall create an all-powerful weapon.

name: Dragon Scale
description: Oho,  a scale taken from the great Omizuchi himself.It appears to be hard enough to deflect any weapon.

name: Moonlit Stone
description: A stone that has been exposed to moonlightfor an incredibly long time. Perhaps we canextract its inner earth energy for ourselves.

name: Branching Flower
description: This flower only blooms at night on mighty treesthat have absorbed an abundance of wood energy.

name: Aqueous Droplet
description: A semi-solid drop of condensed water energy,  anchored in place amidst the sundering flow.

name: Flaming Core
description: A glowing red fragment of hardened lava that holdsa wealth of fire energy deep in its molten core.

name: Metallic Sand
description: Sand that was ground down into miniscule particlesover the ages. It would take a god of the forgeto extract the metal energy radiating within it.

name: Rabbit Meat
description: It is said that one can gain the powers of the creaturesthey consume. Perhaps eating this meat will allow you togain the skill and cunning of a rabbit.

name: Pork
description: Known for its vitality, the meat of pig demons is essentialfor building muscle. I have heard pork is the most commonlyeaten meat in Ouka, a land across the sea.

name: Boar Meat
description: Compared to other demons of its kind, a boar's strength iswithout equal. The meat has a slight gamey odor, it must begently boiled to bring out the delicate flavor.

name: Venison
description: Venison must be properly prepared before it is cooked, but the end result is a truly magical cut of meat thatcan be paired with any dish.

name: Bear Meat
description: Even powerful gods are amazed by the strength and vitalitycontained in bear meat. Though it may prove troublesome tocook, the end result is more than worth the effort.

name: Badger Meat
description: Strangely enough, badger meat can vary in flavor dependingon the type procured. Whether a morsel is palatable or notcomes down to little more than luck.

name: Turtle Meat
description: Turtle meat is oft used as medicine for its rejuvenatingproperties. I recommend eating some when your vitalityis in short supply.

name: Sparrow Meat
description: Ah, the sparrow... The bane of rice fields everywhere.Its crispiness when cooked is simply divine. Small as itmay be, magical energy runs abundant through its meat.

name: Pheasant Meat
description: A pheasant's cunning can be most vexing, but its meat mayhelp to bolster one's skill. Though the texture is ratherbland, the flavor is said to be utterly delicious.

name: Duck Meat
description: Duck meat is revered for its luscious, high-quality fat.After eating some, one cannot help but feel their vitalityrestored and their luck improved.

name: Loach
description: Do not judge the loach by its diminutive size, for it isbrimming with hidden vitality. Be grateful as you carry outyour work on the morrow.

name: Sweetfish
description: A fortuitous fish that has been used in divination sinceancient times. I must say, it's one of my favorites!

name: Carp
description: Carp are said to have the power to boost women's health.I cannot help but wonder how one gets rid of the stenchof mud. It must be the mark of a truly talented chef.

name: Masu Salmon
description: Because of their proclivity for clear water, these fishhave a magnificent fragrance. I imagine they must havepotent spiritual energy swirling in their fishy forms.

name: Char
description: These fish's avid appetites give them a heaping helpingof vitality. They boast a simple yet robust flavor profile.

name: Crucian Carp
description: These fish can be found in nearly every river in Yanato.Flavor notwithstanding, they certainly fill you up.

name: Salmon
description: Salmon are known as the fish of the gods, for they areborn into this world with the spiritual energy to passfrom death to life and the strength to swim upstream.

name: Smelt
description: These fish adore cold water and are blessed with goodfortune. Their tender meat is perfect for frying.

name: Herring
description: It is rare indeed to see these fish come all the way downfrom the northern sea. The delectable fat of their meatis certain to increase your spiritual abilities.

name: Eel
description: A long river fish brimming with wholesome nutrients.Its wriggling energy imparts skill and strength.

name: Basket Clam
description: Shellfish suck up the spiritual energy from the mudand sand. Particularly big clams are liable to devolveinto demons if exposed to too much negative energy.

name: Egg
description: A hard-shelled bird egg. Not only will it expand yourcooking repertoire, but I have heard that it has manyhealth benefits as well.

name: Grasshopper
description: While this pest may feast on our ears of rice, as an ingredient it imparts vitality to dishes.

name: Bee Larva
description: This insect is prized for its health and vitalityboosting properties. As for its appearance...Well, one can get used to anything, I suppose.

name: Brown Rice
description: Though this rice is unmilled, many prefer its fragrance andflavor. It is said to be more nutritious than white rice.

name: Mixed Rice
description: This rice has only been partially milled. It thereforefeatures the properties of both white and brown rice.

name: White Rice
description: This pearly white rice has been immaculately polished.Why, these grains are the very soul of the Yanato people!

name: Wheat
description: Though it is counted among the five grains, the wheatharvested on this island is not suited for cultivation.You are certainly free to use it as an ingredient, however.

name: Foxtail Millet
description: One of the five grains, and said to be the oldest cropsgrown in Yanato. It may not do much to sate the appetite, but it does appear to be good for your health.

name: Sanwa Millet
description: One of the five grains, and one of the most popular cropsproduced in Yanato, thanks to its ability to grow even inpoor soil. It also contains a hint of spiritual energy.

name: Bean
description: One of the five grains, and a source of great strength.It is also used as an ingredient in many magnificentcondiments, such as miso and soy sauce.

name: Buckwheat
description: A hardy plant grown to stave off famine. In additionto filling your stomach, it may very well grant youthe ability to pull off even more skills in combat.

name: Tekusari
description: Even though the roots of this hardy plant are poisonous, it can be consumed after being crushed and soaked in water.Many farmers plant these in preparation for poor harvests.

name: Acorn
description: This is the hard-shelled fruit of a broad-leafed tree.It may be meager, but every little bit goes a long way.

name: Taro
description: Taro is a root plant that has been keeping the peopleof Yanato fed since long before even the five grains.These days, it's the star of many a dinnertime dish.

name: Potato
description: The potato is a kind of taro that's grown in frigid landsand has found its way to Yanato as of late. It is quitefilling for a root plant, and may bestow extra vitality.

name: Onion
description: This appears to be a bulbous version of the green onion.It seems to grant good fortune, and is favored by warriorsof the west. Also notorious for inducing tears when cut.

name: Warabi
description: A fern that is immensely bitter and frequently growsin the wilds of nearby settlements. Its acute flavormay give you the capacity to perform additional skills.

name: Horsetail
description: These shoots from the horsetail plant are a medicinal herb.It gathers spiritual energy from the soil, which gives ita bittersweet flavor that evokes memories of springtime.

name: Mugwort
description: A fragrant herb that can be found in the springtime.It is well known for its various medicinal properties, the most useful of which is amplifying your vitality.

name: Seven Herbs
description: Water dropwort, shepherd's purse, cudweed, chickweed, nipplewort, turnip, and radish. If you manage to findall seven, legend says that fortune will favor you.

name: Root Crops
description: Burdock, carrots, radishes, and the like are all delectableand abounding in nutrients. Whether or not you enjoy theirtaste, eating them will certainly make you more healthy.

name: Cucumber
description: A juicy vegetable that is both sweet and slightly bitter.They are especially well-loved by the water-dwelling kappa.

name: Maize
description: An unfamiliar plant comprised of tiny yellow kernels.To my knowledge, this crop is not grown in Yanato.

name: Mushroom
description: A phenomenal variety of mushrooms grow around the treesof the mountain, including maitake, shimeji, and shiitake.Their nutrients will boost your muscles and grant strength.

name: Matsutake
description: My word... This mushroom is known to be exceedingly rare!You must boast incredibly good fortune to have found it.Maybe eating it will bring even more luck into your life.

name: Chestnut
description: The hard outer shell hides a sweet inner core. Moreover, partaking of it may strengthen your spiritual powers.

name: Ginkgo Nut
description: These nuts come from the seeds of ginkgo trees. The femaletrees produce ovules said to bestow health and long life.

name: Persimmon
description: The persimmons on this island vary greatly between beingastringent and delectably sweet. You must have good luckif you managed to land on a sweet one...this time.

name: Garlic
description: A wild plant that packs quite a punch. Its vigorous flavordoes wonders for your vitality...less so for your breath.

name: Wasabi
description: This wild plant frequently grows by clear streams and isused as a seasoning. Its excessive spiciness will clear outyour sinuses and get your spiritual powers pumping.

name: Ginger
description: A root that has long been used both to stifle stenchesand season suppers. Guaranteed to warm you up, bolsteryour strength, and boost your capacity for using skills.

name: Green Onion
description: Eaten raw, it is spicy and crisp, but cooking it willbring out its inner sweetness. It also has medicinal uses, and is even known to raise one's skilfulness in battle.

name: Plum
description: The hint of sweetness hidden within its acutely sour tasteis like a metaphor for raising children. Unlike parenthood, eating it may also prove to be beneficial to your health.

name: Salt
description: Salt is a mineral that is indispensable as a preservativenot only for food, but also for your mind and body. It isknown to have the power to cleanse all sorts of impurities.

name: Sugar
description: A sweetener harvested from sugarcane grown on an islandin the southern sea. It is of high quality, but has beenspreading as of late, even commoners can enjoy it now.

name: Sesame
description: The seed of a flowering plant that is used to seasonmany a dish. It has been cherished since ancient times, and is also abounding in nutrients.

name: Kombu Kelp
description: A type of seaweed that has been long beloved in Yanatoas the base of a soup stock and as a general ingredient.

name: Tea
description: Although the tea plant came from Ouka, there was alreadya species growing on this island. Its leaves are used fordivination. Drinking it in a hot broth brings good fortune.

name: Fish Mint
description: A medicinal herb effective against a variety of ailments.It can be particularly useful as a remedy for poison...not to mention quite delectable when made into tempura.

name: Soup Stock
description: Made from ingredients that are boiled to bring outtheir flavor. A culinary necessity in any kitchen.

name: Miso
description: A paste made by mixing and then fermenting crushed beans, malt, and salt. It is palatable, filling, and invigorating.Truly a more perfect ingredient could not exist!

name: Soy Sauce
description: A liquid seasoning made from fermented soybean paste.Use it to enliven noodle dishes like udon and soba.

name: Oil
description: Refined oil, with the dregs carefully filtered out. A lifeof luxury is incomplete without this invaluable substance.

name: Vegetable Oil
description: A raw oil extracted from perilla seeds and the like.It contains dregs and is rather pungent, making itdifficult to use in this form.

name: Fish Oil
description: A raw oil extracted from fish. It contains dregs and israther pungent, making it difficult to use in this form.

name: Ice
description: Renowned water that has been frozen in some frigid place.It keeps foodstuffs cool and prevents them from rotting...until it melts, that is.

name: Vinegar
description: A seasoning produced by fermenting malted rice to createacetic acid. Its sour flavor relieves exhaustion.

name: Health Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourhealth. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Skill Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourskill capacity. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Strength Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourstrength. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Vitality Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourvitality. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Magic Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourmagic. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Luck Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourluck. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Fullness Powder
description: A powdered medicine that will temporarily increase yourfullness. Dissolve it in water to partake of it.

name: Health Flakes
description: When combined with a medicinal base, these flakeswill serve to increase your base health.

name: Strength Flakes
description: When combined with a medicinal base, these flakeswill serve to increase your base strength.

name: Vitality Flakes
description: When combined with a medicinal base, these flakeswill serve to increase your base vitality.

name: Magic Flakes
description: When combined with a medicinal base, these flakeswill serve to increase your base magic.

name: Luck Flakes
description: When combined with a medicinal base, these flakeswill serve to increase your base luck.

name: Gusto Flakes
description: When combined with a medicinal base, these flakeswill serve to increase your base gusto.

name: Medicinal Base
description: When combined with flakes, this medicinal basewill increase your various capabilities.

name: Malt
description: A thick, syrupy substance made of steamed and fermentedrice. It is the basis of many recipes and seasonings.

name: Rice Bran
description: A collection of dregs left over from the hulling process, including the shells and sprouts. It is very functional, ready to be used for cleaning in addition to cooking.

name: Mochi
description: A kind of cake made by adding water to rice, pounding it, and letting it harden. It is delightful both when boiledand toasted. What's more, it's extremely easy to preserve!

name: Tofu
description: This bean curd is made by combining soybean juicewith a salt solution and letting the mixture harden.

name: Rice Cake
description: This rice has been mixed with water, pounded, and moldedinto a round shape. In the olden days, the children of menused to regularly present these as an offering to the gods.

name: Dried Rabbit Meat
description: Rabbit Meat that has been dried in the sun to preventit from rotting. Most foods will last longer whenrobbed of the water within them.

name: Dried Pork
description: Pork that has been dried in the sun to preventit from rotting. Most foods will last longer whenrobbed of the water within them.

name: Smoked Rabbit Meat
description: Rabbit Meat that has been salted, smoked, and dried.The smoky fragrance mixes well with its rich flavor.

name: Smoked Pork
description: Pork that has been salted, smoked, and dried.The smoky fragrance mixes well with its rich flavor.

name: Pickled Tekusari
description: Tekusari that has been pickled in salted rice bran.Its potent flavor will wash over you with just one bite.

name: Rabbit Meat Sushi
description: Pickled and salted Rabbit Meat put in rice to preserve it.Some peculiar folks claim it becomes even more appealingwith every sniff, but I am not so easily convinced.

name: Masu Salmon Sushi

name: Cheese
description: A dairy product that is widely adored in western lands.Perhaps it could be compared to Yanato's condensed milk.

name: Dried Herring
description: This appears to be herring that was preserved with herbs, vinegar, and salt. Myrthe says that it is a famous productof her homeland, Ventania. It's not entirely unlike sushi.

name: Dried Boiled Rice
description: A grain that has been dried out in the sun and robbedof its water contents. It is best when soaked in boiledwater to rehydrate it before being eaten.

name: Dried Salmon
description: Salted salmon, dried in the sea breeze to preserve it.While it may keep for some time, it also happens to beincredibly salty. Take care not to gorge yourself on it.

name: Dried Taro Stem
description: The dried stem of a taro plant, woven into a cord.Often carried by soldiers headed to the battlefield.

name: Dried Persimmon
description: A persimmon hung under the eave of a house and dried untildeveloping a powdery exterior. Its mouthwatering sweetnessis simply divine! Truly this is autumn's finest treasure.

name: Pickled Wasabi
description: Chopped wasabi pickled in sake. Goes well with alcohol--perhaps a little too well. Be wary not to drink too much.

name: Pickled Dried Plum
description: A plum that has been pickled in salt. Not only is it usedfor battle rations, but also as a medicine to cure poisons.

name: Spring Water
description: Ah, this must be clean water that was drawn from a springdown in the valley. I must admit, it's better for drinkingand cooking than the water found around the mountain pass.

name: Renowned Water
description: Water that is renowned for its purity, which has beenmelted down from solid ice. I imagine it is the highestquality water that we can hope to find on this island.

name: Kuchikami Sake
description: An alcohol fermented with human saliva.It reeks to high heaven and is horribly unsanitary.Only the truly courageous are bold enough to consume it.

name: Doburoku
description: Unfiltered, cloudy-white sake.Blends a piercing sourness with a robust, rice-like flavor.

name: Amazake
description: A drink made by saccharizing rice.Be fooled not by its name: this draught is virgin.Gently sweet and energizing.

name: Refined Sake
description: A clear alcohol that has been filtered and heated.Has a rich flavor with a hint of sweetness.

name: Medicinal Sake
description: Highly nutritious roots and leaves have been added to thissake to make it medicinal. As bitter as it tastes, at leastit will make you hardy enough to resist most poisons.

name: Ginjo Sake
description: An alcohol made by refining polished rice and fermenting it over low heat.Smooth, palatable, and incredibly fragrant.

name: Daiginjo Sake
description: An alcohol made by carefully selecting only the best grains of riceand polishing them to perfection. Its translucence and superlativefragrance certify its status as a true work of art.

name: Brown Rice Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Mixed Rice Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: White Rice Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Wheat Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Foxtail Millet Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Sanwa Millet Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Bean Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Buckwheat Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains used adds to its delectability.

name: Beer
description: An alcohol from the far west made with wheat.Myrthe's favorite drink. It seems that her faithdoes not forbid the consumption of spirits...

name: Cooked Brown Rice
description: Firm and fragrant brown rice, boiled to perfection.Eat up before it gets cold.

name: Cooked Mixed Rice
description: This mixed rice is boiled to perfection.Every bite is rich in flavor and nutrients.

name: Cooked White Rice
description: White rice boiled to perfection. Each glisteninggrain is your reward for months of painstaking toil.

name: Steamed Rice
description: White rice that has been steamed with sake,amplifying its natural sweetness.

name: Sansai Rice
description: Rice that has been steamed with sake and mixedwith wild vegetables. The rustic, crispy crunchof this dish will make one's heart sing.

name: Chestnut Rice
description: Rice that has been steamed with sake and mixed withchestnuts. The steaming enhances the chestnuts'natural sweetness to create a dish for any palate.

name: Ginkgo Rice
description: Rice that has been steamed with sake and mixed withginkgo nuts. Savor the ingredient's enhanced flavor.

name: Fried Rice
description: Boiled rice that has been fried in a splashof soy sauce. Both its fragrance and textureare simply irresistable.

name: Sekihan
description: Red rice that has been steamed in a vat.A fascinating blend of salty and sweetthat calls to mind a celebratory mood.

name: Mixed Grain Rice
description: Five types of rice that have been mixed and steamedtogether. A highly nutritious meal, its five colorsguarantee ever-changing flavor with every bite.

name: Cooked Wheat
description: A meal made of cooked Wheat.Satisfying, but it doesn't compareto the piquant taste of rice.

name: Cooked Foxtail Millet
description: A meal made of cooked Foxtail Millet.Satisfying, but it doesn't compareto the piquant taste of rice.

name: Cooked Sanwa Millet
description: A meal made of cooked Sanwa Millet.Satisfying, but it doesn't compareto the piquant taste of rice.

name: Dried Boiled Rice
description: Dried cooked rice that has been rehydratedwith boiling water. It has a rather lightflavor, similar to porridge.

name: Brown Rice Porridge
description: A meal made of boiled Brown Rice.It's mushy and easy to digest, making ita perfect meal for the bedridden.

name: Mixed Rice Porridge
description: A meal made of boiled Mixed Rice.It's mushy and easy to digest, making ita perfect meal for the bedridden.

name: White Rice Porridge

name: Sanwa Millet Porridge

name: Seven Herb Porridge
description: Porridge garnished with seven herbs,finely chopped. Its light, refreshingflavor heralds the arrival of spring.

name: Brown Rice Zosui
description: A meal made of Brown Rice boiledwith rice. It is bound to warm youto the core on chilly evenings.

name: Mixed Rice Zosui
description: A meal made of Mixed Rice boiledwith rice. It is bound to warm youto the core on chilly evenings.

name: Brown Rice Chazuke
description: White rice soaked in tea and sprinkled withsoy sauce. Silky smooth for easy digestion,with an irresistably invigorating aftertaste.

name: Matsutake Chazuke
description: Chazuke garnished with matsutake mushrooms,which are a rare delicacy on Hinoe Island.How decadent! What lies beyond this luxury?

name: Aburi Mochi
description: Enticingly aromatic, puffy mochi that has beentoasted over a fire. You may be tempted to digright in, but do be careful! It's quite hot.

name: Udon
description: Thick noodles made by combining wheat flourwith salt and water. They slide down the throatwith glorious ease.

name: Kitsune Udon
description: Adding fried tofu to udon creates a simply divinebroth. Fried tofu is a famed favorite of fox gods,and thus I dub this Kitsune Udon.

name: Tempura Udon
description: Ohoho, udon topped with Tempura Udon tempura?Yes please! The way the fried coating dissolvesin the broth is utterly magnificent.

name: Somen
description: Thinly sliced noodles glazed with oil and sun dried.Their delicate form mixes well with broth and otheringredients, making a solid foundation for any meal.

name: Soba
description: Noodles made by combining water and buckwheat flour,which is then stretched and cut into thin slices.They give off a faint aroma of buckwheat.

name: Tanuki Soba
description: Myrthe is an odd one, scattering tempura flakes atopsoba noodles. And yet, it's delicious. The dark flakesremind me of a raccoon dog. I dub this Tanuki Soba!

name: Sansai Soba
description: Soba noodles accompanied by mountain vegetables.The crunch of the vegetables is a delightfulcontrast to the noodles' silky-smooth texture.

name: Tempura Soba
description: Soba noodles adorned with Tempura Soba tempurais not a dish to be overlooked or underestimated.The texture of the noodles is perfection itself.

name: Pannenkoek
description: A beloved treat of Myrthe's native Ventania,this pancake is made by spreading dough thinlyacross a grill and topping it with ingredients.

name: Tekusari Dumplings
description: Crushed tekusari roots rolled into edible dumplings. As long as the poison has been steeped out of theroots, they make for adequate rations.

name: Preserved Rations
description: Foodstuffs that I brought with me from the capital.We must secure a foothold on this island before weinevitably run out of edible things to eat...

name: Charred Lump
description: Hrm. Myrthe claims to be a skilled chef, but...Well, everyone makes mistakes, I suppose.

name: Roasted Acorns
description: Fragrant acorns that were soaked to remove theirbitterness, then roasted. While they taste good,a handful of oaknuts does not a hearty meal make.

name: Natto
description: Steamed soy beans wrapped in rice straw and fermented.The peculiar odor and stickiness can be offputting,but after one bite you'll become a lifelong fan.

name: Miso-Coated Tofu
description: Tofu is grilled until golden brown and coatedin thick miso paste. One whiff of its savoryaroma is guaranteed to whet your appetite.

name: Chilled Tofu
description: A classic summer dish of chilled tofu accompaniedby soy sauce and other mouth-watering seasonings.The perfect complement to an evening's libations.

name: Corn on the Cob
description: For this recipe passed down from the far west,maize is grilled and coated with a sweet sauce.One bite and you'll be awash in savory sweetness.

name: Pickled Wasabi
description: Wasabi that has been pickled in sake lees.Packed with a ripened spiciness, it impartsa satisfying crunch with each and every bite.

name: Pickled Dried Plum
description: Salted pickled plums that have been sun-dried andfermented. Biting into one releases a powerfularoma and a rich, bittersweet flavor.

name: Fried Egg
description: Cooked eggs rolled into a cylindrical shape thencut into bite-sized slices. The soft texture andsweet flavor will surely put a smile on your face.

name: Chawanmushi
description: A dish from the continent of Ouka made by mixinga beaten egg with stock and other ingredients.Such gentle flavor! It warms me to my very core.

name: Boiled Tofu
description: Tofu is dropped into soup stock and water,then boiled. The center comes out piping hot,so give it time to cool down before enjoying!

name: Dried Salmon
description: Salmon that has been soaked in salt water and driedin the sea breeze. This pairs wondrously with sake!Though do take care not to gorge yourself.

name: Fried Tekusari

name: Rabbit Hot Pot
description: Hot pot brimming with rabbit meat, cooked untiltender. The broth has absorbed the deep flavorof the meat.

name: Boar Hot Pot
description: Hot pot brimming with boar meat. The tough meatimparts a flavor that deepens with each bite.

name: Deer Hot Pot
description: Hot pot brimming with venison. The lightnessof the meat belies a deeply satisfying flavor.

name: Turtle Hot Pot
description: Hot pot brimming with turtle meat. Creates a trulyspectacular broth, and pairs well with vegetables.

name: Bear Hot Pot
description: Hot pot brimming with bear meat. Not only is itnutritious, but the fattiness it adds is unlikeany other meat.

name: Dried Herring
description: This appears to be herring that was preserved with herbs,vinegar, and salt. Myrthe says that it is a famous productof her homeland, Ventania. It's not entirely unlike sushi.

name: Hutspot
description: A dish of Myrthe's native Ventania made fromchopped potatoes and root vegetables steamedand mashed. This will fill your belly right up!

name: Dumpling
description: Rice cakes coated with sauce as they cook on stickskewers. The soft texture combined with the sweetand savory sauce is in a league of its own.

name: Mugwort Dumpling
description: Rice cakes that have had mugwort finely kneadedinto them. They taste of spring itself.

name: Sesame Dumpling
description: A sweet treat that hails from the country of Ouka,made from all sorts of sesame. I am impressed theymanaged to make such a jelly out of sesame alone.

name: Dried Persimmon
description: Persimmons that have been dried on a cord.This powerfully sweet fruit melts in your mouth,making it difficult to put down after the first bite.

name: Shaved Ice
description: Ice that has been shaved down into tiny particles.The perfect remedy for when you feel hot or feverish.

name: Senbei
description: Sweet mochi rolled into flat circles, then grilledto form crackers. They are delightfully crispy.

name: Soba Dumpling
description: Buckwheat flour is tossed in boiling water and clumpedtogether to form this dessert. Though the ingredientsare the same, it is wholly unlike soba noodles.

name: Rice Cake
description: Rice softened in water, then pounded and shapedinto a ball. They have long been used as offeringsto the gods from the children of men.

name: Manju
description: Steamed sweet dumplings that are knownto pair well with a variety of ingredients.

name: Kenpin
description: Wheat flour that has been kneaded, rolled,and fried. Fill them with red bean pasteor vegetables for an even tastier treat.

name: Grilled Miso
description: Miso mixed with finely chopped spices, then grilled.It pairs exceptionally well with rice and sake.

name: Water
description: Fresh water from the mountain pass.

name: Spring Water
description: Oho! Water from the springs of the valley.It is quite clear and extremely refreshing.

name: Renowned Water
description: Smooth and with a hint of sweetness. Indeed,it tastes as though one sip would wash awayany impurity. It's no wonder it's renowned!

name: Tea
description: A drink made by pouring boiling water over driedtea leaves. No matter what flavor of tea is used,it always enhances the taste of any meal.

name: Genmaicha
description: The idea of combining roasted tea leaves with brownrice was truly a revelation. It is bound to helpcalm the nerves and relieve pent-up stress.

name: Fish Mint Tea
description: A tea made with dried fish mint leaves.In the Lofty Realm, this drink is saidto grant protection from poisonous mist.

name: Kelp Tea
description: Though it is called tea, it is not made with tealeaves. This is a hot broth made from roastingand drying kelp, then boiling it in hot water.

name: Plum Kelp Tea
description: Kelp tea that has had plums added to it, creatinga sour flavor. This divine combination is certainto soothe tension and melt the most anxious heart.

name: Lucky Tea
description: Plum kelp tea with a further addition of green tealeaves. According to the common wisdom of the LowlyRealm, it wards off evil. Here's hoping it works!

name: Kuchikami Sake
description: Alcohol fermented with human saliva. It reeks tohigh heaven and is horribly unsanitary. Only thetruly courageous are bold enough to consume it.

name: Doburoku
description: Cloudy white sake that is completely unfiltered.A blend of piercing sourness and potent rice flavor.

name: Amazake
description: A beverage made by converting rice into sugar.Be fooled not by its name: this draught containsno alcohol. It is gently sweet and energizing.

name: Refined Sake
description: Sake that has been filtered and heated until itruns clear. It has a rich flavor with just a hintof sweetness to balance out the refined taste.

name: Medicinal Sake
description: Sake truly cures all ills. This kind in particular hashad medicinal herbs added to it. It will bolster yourfortitude and give you some resistance to poison.

name: Ginjo Sake
description: Sake that is made by refining polished riceand fermenting it over low heat. The resultis smooth, palatable, and incredibly fragrant.

name: Daiginjo Sake
description: Sake made by carefully selecting the finest grainsof rice and polishing them to perfection. Translucentand fragrant, it qualifies as a true work of art!

name: Brown Rice Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Mixed Rice Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: White Rice Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Wheat Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Foxtail Millet Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Sanwa Millet Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Bean Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Buckwheat Shochu
description: A strong alcohol made from distilled ingredients.The flavor of the grains adds to its delectability.

name: Beer
description: An alcohol of the far west made from wheat.Its bitterness may be an acquired taste,but it certainly goes down smooth.
